content.html: In my first serious job, my boss took me out to lunch and offered to increase my salary if I agreed to give my full effort to migrating from Rails to Java. I told him I already had an offer paying me 2x his proposed salary increase.
content.value:
In my first serious job, my boss took me out to lunch and offered to increase my salary if I agreed to give my full effort to migrating from Rails to Java.

I told him I already had an offer paying me 2x his proposed salary increase.
